description: Marc Bowman has a great body with a low pain tolerance...Kym taunts him for being so weak and decides to punish him in less conventional ways. With any mistake he makes his cock and balls are shocked mercilessly! The elctric agony continues as she fucks him deep in the ass before ordering him to leave the room while she waits for a real man!
title: Marc Bowman and Kym Wilde
